duties_responsibilities.duty: Own and manage the deliverance of global payroll, ensuring compliance with country-specific laws and regulations.
Preparation and distribution of payroll reports to relevant departments, while providing payroll information and assistance to employees and managers.
Analysis, preparation, and input of payroll data, along with maintaining related payroll records and reports.
Perform various journal entries, account reconciliations, and accruals, ensuring compliance and up-to-date knowledge of payroll regulations.
Liaison with Finance and People & Culture departments to align payroll activities and functions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field (Master's preferred)
